projects.name: EZY Skills
projects.desc: EZY Skills is an interactive EdTech frontend platform designed to guide beginners in IT career paths through a decision-tree chatbot and dynamic course catalog. It transforms complex learning data into clear, engaging, and production-ready user experiences.
features: Interactive decision-tree chatbot for personalized career guidance
Dynamic course catalog with category filters and detailed pages
Advanced course details with objectives, syllabus, and project showcases
Reusable and scalable component architecture for maintainability
Smooth animations and UX-focused transitions using Framer Motion and SCSS
Auto-scrolling conversations and interactive option cards
architecture: Feature-based folder structure: pages, components, shared logic
Separation of global UI components and feature-specific components
Optimized routing with React Router DOM
State management scalable via Redux Toolkit
design_system: Primary Colors: Orange (#F98149), Navy (#0E2C40), Royal Blue (#0148A9)
Interactive elements: hover effects, card elevations, smooth transitions
projects.goal: Empower beginners to explore IT career paths confidently while providing a scalable, interactive, and visually engaging learning platform.

projects.name: Cartopiaa
projects.desc: Cartopiaa is a modern, responsive e-commerce application built with React and Vite. It provides a premium user experience with smooth animations, intuitive navigation, dynamic product catalogs, and a fully functional cart and checkout system.
features: Homepage with Hero, Best Sellers, Featured Products, and scroll animations
Dynamic product catalog with filtering, sorting, and sidebars
Product details pages with image galleries, specifications, stock state, and related products slider
Fully functional cart with real-time calculations, delete confirmations, and hover animations
Favorites page to save preferred products
Checkout page with modern form-based order finalization
Chatbot AI assistant with dynamic questions loaded from JSON and container-only auto-scrolling
Reusable Skeleton loading system for pages and components
Scroll reveal animations across all major pages using Framer Motion
Responsive mobile-first design with adaptive Navbar & Footer
architecture: Component-based architecture with separation of concerns
Lazy loading of route components with React.lazy and Suspense
status: Homepage, Products, ProductInfo, Cart, Favorites, Checkout, and Chatbot pages completed
projects.goal: Demonstrate advanced React frontend skills by creating a production-ready e-commerce platform.

projects.name: Ahmed Portfolio Website
projects.desc: Ahmed's Professional Portfolio Website showcases modern web development skills, responsive design, animations, and interactive UI components.
features: Responsive homepage and about sections
Projects grid and detailed project pages
Animated UI with AOS
Contact form and FAQ section
projects.goal: Present a professional portfolio showcasing modern frontend capabilities.

projects.name: Elite Gym
projects.desc: Elite Gym is a professional, full-featured gym management platform built with Next.js. It enables gym owners and trainers to manage trainees, schedules, payments, and progress tracking through a modern dashboard with real-time data synchronization and AI-powered fitness assistance.
features: Role-based authentication for captains and trainees
Comprehensive dashboard with real-time stats
Full trainee management
Advanced schedule management
Payment plans UI
AI fitness assistant with multilingual voice input
Speech-to-text with RTL Arabic support
Appwrite realtime backend
projects.goal: Deliver a scalable, AI-powered gym management system.

projects.name: Portfolio Performance Optimization
projects.desc: A complete performance overhaul and optimization project for Mahmoud Fathy's portfolio website. The project transforms a standard Next.js application into a highly optimized, production-ready platform with excellent Core Web Vitals, reduced bundle size, and smooth GPU-accelerated animations.
features: 78% build time reduction using Turbopack and optimized dependency resolution
Complete removal of AOS and replacement with GPU-accelerated CSS animations
Strict enforcement of exactly 4 images per project for optimal gallery performance
Advanced React performance optimizations using memoization and hooks
Improved Core Web Vitals (LCP, INP, CLS) across all devices
Mobile-first performance tuning for low-end devices
Code splitting with dynamic imports and skeleton loaders
Zero layout shift animations using transform and opacity only
architecture: Optimized rendering with useMemo and useCallback
design_system: Minimal animation system using Tailwind CSS
No category-based UI to reduce complexity
projects.goal: Deliver a high-performance, scalable, and production-ready portfolio website with industry-level optimization standards.

projects.name: Flame & Bun
projects.desc: Flame & Bun is a modern, fully-featured burger restaurant web application built with Next.js 16 and React 19. This is a comprehensive e-commerce platform for ordering burgers online with advanced features including cart management, favorites system, and detailed product catalog.
features: Full product catalog with 26+ burger varieties
Shopping cart system with add/remove functionality
Favorites/wishlist system
User authentication system
Detailed burger information (ingredients, nutrition, allergens)
Customization options and pricing
Responsive design with mobile-first approach
Sticky navigation with active state indicators
Modern toast notifications and smooth animations
design_system: Clean aesthetic with red/orange flame theme
projects.goal: Deliver a professional-grade, production-ready restaurant e-commerce platform that showcases modern web development best practices.

projects.name: Cafe Ramadan
projects.desc: Cafe Ramadan is a beautifully crafted, modern web application designed to enhance the Ramadan experience. It blends traditional Ramadan spirit with contemporary web design, featuring smooth GSAP animations, a responsive layout, and a seamless user experience. Note: This project was inspired by and built following a tutorial from the JS Mastery YouTube channel.
features: Next.js 16.1.6 (App Router) for server-side rendering and performance
Advanced GSAP Animations: ScrollTrigger, SplitText, and Timelines
Responsive Design using Tailwind CSS 4
Modern UI/UX with a Ramadan-themed aesthetic
Optimized Images and Fonts (Geist)
Component-based architecture with strict TypeScript typing
Interactive Menu and Art Gallery sections
architecture: App Router with Server and Client Components
projects.goal: To create an immersive digital experience that celebrates the spirit of Ramadan through modern web technology.

projects.name: Best Drink - Premium Egyptian Juice Website
projects.desc: Best Drink is a premium Egyptian juice website showcasing modern web development capabilities with advanced animations, dynamic theming, and responsive design. Built with Next.js 14+ and GSAP, it delivers an immersive user experience with smooth scroll-triggered animations and state-driven UI updates.
features: Next.js 14+ with App Router architecture for optimal performance
Advanced GSAP animations with ScrollTrigger for smooth scroll-based effects
Dynamic theming system with React Context for real-time color changes
Responsive design with mobile-first approach and fluid typography
Component-based architecture with reusable UI elements
Image optimization using Next.js Image component with lazy loading
State management using React Context API for global state
Performance optimizations with code splitting and memoization
architecture: Next.js App Router with Server and Client Components
Mixed Server/Client component pattern for optimal performance
Custom hooks for animation logic encapsulation
design_system: Dynamic theming with CSS custom properties
Responsive utility classes with mobile-first approach
projects.goal: Create a premium, immersive digital experience for an Egyptian juice brand that showcases advanced frontend capabilities and modern web development best practices.

projects.name: NovaTek - Advanced Electronics E-Commerce Platform
projects.desc: NovaTek is a production-grade electronics e-commerce platform engineered using Next.js 16 App Router and React 19. The project focuses on scalable frontend architecture, modular state management, optimized data fetching, and high-performance UI rendering. It transforms a traditional product catalog into a highly interactive, filter-driven shopping experience with enterprise-level structural design.
features: Multi-dimensional filtering engine (category, brand, rating, price range, keyword search)
Parallel data fetching strategy using Promise.all for reduced latency
Centralized global state management via ProductContext
Memoized filtering and sorting computations for performance optimization
Pagination with customizable page sizes and dynamic recalculation
Fully modular cart system with persistent localStorage integration
Checkout workflow with structured form validation using React Hook Form + Zod
Favorites system with global toggle integration across product components
Skeleton loaders and placeholder states to prevent cumulative layout shift (CLS)
Client-side and server-side component composition for optimal rendering
architecture: Layered architecture separating UI, state, services, and utilities
Service layer abstraction for API requests
Context-driven state management with memoized selectors
Server/Client component hybrid strategy for optimal SSR + interactivity
Strict separation between business logic and UI components
design_system: Accessible UI built on Radix primitives
Consistent spacing scale and layout grid system
status: Full product listing and filtering system implemented
Cart, Checkout, and Favorites modules integrated
Advanced search and sorting engine completed
Performance optimizations applied (memoization, lazy loading, optimized images)
projects.goal: To engineer a scalable, maintainable, and performance-optimized e-commerce frontend system that demonstrates advanced architectural thinking, state orchestration, and UI engineering capabilities suitable for enterprise-level applications.
